    Class
    Description
    ApartmentController
    Controller class responsible for handling apartment-related requests Provides methods for displaying, updating, deleting, and creating apartments
    HomeController
    Controller class responsible for handling the home page request Provides method for displaying the home page
    LoginController
    Controller class responsible for handling login functionality Provides methods for displaying the login page and handling login success
    RegisterController
    Controller class responsible for handling user registration functionality Provides methods for displaying registration form, submitting user registration, and handling admin registration

    Controller class responsible for handling user-related functionality Provides methods for displaying users, updating user information, and deleting users
